timeline.message:
dependency: bump pmd.version from 6.22.0 to 6.23.0

Bumps `pmd.version` from 6.22.0 to 6.23.0.

Updates `pmd-java` from 6.22.0 to 6.23.0
- [Release notes](https://github.com/pmd/pmd/releases)
- [Commits](https://github.com/pmd/pmd/compare/pmd_releases/6.22.0...pmd_releases/6.23.0)

Updates `pmd-core` from 6.22.0 to 6.23.0
- [Release notes](https://github.com/pmd/pmd/releases)
- [Commits](https://github.com/pmd/pmd/compare/pmd_releases/6.22.0...pmd_releases/6.23.0)

Updates `pmd-javascript` from 6.22.0 to 6.23.0
- [Release notes](https://github.com/pmd/pmd/releases)
- [Commits](https://github.com/pmd/pmd/compare/pmd_releases/6.22.0...pmd_releases/6.23.0)

Updates `pmd-jsp` from 6.22.0 to 6.23.0
- [Release notes](https://github.com/pmd/pmd/releases)
- [Commits](https://github.com/pmd/pmd/compare/pmd_releases/6.22.0...pmd_releases/6.23.0)

Signed-off-by: dependabot-preview[bot] <support@dependabot.com>

timeline.bodyText: We do not need this suppression. The CliOptions are already suppressed in pmd-main.xml
timeline.author: pbludov

timeline.bodyText: There should be $ in the annotation name. And we do not need other annotations except this one.
timeline.author: pbludov
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -16,9 +16,7 @@
             <!-- Fields with these annotations will have their value injected by picocli.
               These fields should not be marked final. -->
             <property name="ignoredAnnotations"
-                      value="picocli.CommandLine.Option
